definition: addressee/name of recipient on painting or scroll
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: During the period of vacancy, his or her duties shall be assumed according to the provisions of the preceding paragraph.
sentences.chinese: 行政长官缺位期间的职务代理，依照上款规定管理。

sentences.english: It's been more than a year since Apple since the previous model was released.
sentences.chinese: 因为自从上款机型发布以来已经有一年多时间了。

sentences.english: Direct seller's exam should cover above contents.
sentences.chinese: 直销员考试应含有上款所规定的内容。

sentences.english: This means that the potential customer base for the phone has expanded greatly since the last model was launched.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着与上款机型相比潜在客户基础会极大地增加。

definition: to write the title of a book on a label
short comment or critical appraisal added at the end of a text, on a painting etc
to create a work of calligraphy for display in a prominent place (typically, a sign)
(honorific written address to younger man) My dear young friend
interpreting words/to explain the meaning of words in classic texts/to decipher an old script
vertical scroll (painting or calligraphy)/vertical shaft (of a machine)
